name: Ars Poetica by Doug Anderson
description:
Spend a little time playing through a poem. This is the first poem in what I hope will become a series of small playable poems.

A bitsy made game using  a number of hacks added through borsky. 

The author of the poem is Doug Anderson. He had no involvement in this project but I hope that if ever does see this he enjoys it. Find more about Doug Anderson on Poetry Foundation.
